ly.img.android.pesdk.ui.widgets

Interface AdjustSlider.AdjustBarChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransformToolPanel
    Enclosing class:
    AdjustSlider

    public AdjustSlider.AdjustBarChangeListener

    A callback that notifies clients when the progress level has been changed. This includes changes that were initiated by the user through a touch gesture or arrow key/trackball as well as changes that were initiated programmatically.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void onProgressChanged(AdjustSlider seekBar, float value, boolean fromUser)
      Notification that the progress level has changed. Clients can use the fromUser parameter to distinguish user-initiated changes from those that occurred programmatically.

    • Method Detail

      • onProgressChanged

        void onProgressChanged(AdjustSlider seekBar,
                       float value,
                       boolean fromUser)

        Notification that the progress level has changed. Clients can use the fromUser parameter to distinguish user-initiated changes from those that occurred programmatically.

        Parameters:
        seekBar - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@147c9e76: The SeekBar whose progress has changed
        value - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@3ad6316: The current progress level. This will be in the range min..max where max was set by ly.img.android.pesdk.ui.widgets.AdjustSlider$setMax(kotlin.Float) and min was set by ly.img.android.pesdk.ui.widgets.AdjustSlider$setMin(kotlin.Float). (The default value for max is 1.)
        fromUser - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@74e6f6d0: True if the progress change was initiated by the user.
